clienttime.config.time.info.active: Whether or not the current time is §6overridden§r
clienttime.config.time.info.timetype:
The behavior of how ClientTime sets the time 

§6Static§r - The time §6doesn't change§r, akin to having doDaylightCycle off
§9Loop Skip§r - When the §6end time§r is reached, ClientTime will set the current
 time §6back to the start time§r
§bLoop Reverse§r - When the end time is reached, the currenrt time will go §6backwards§r
 until the start time is reached, at which point time will go forwards again
clienttime.config.time.info.time:
The §6time that is set when the mod is active§r, in ticks
When §6Loop Speed§r is greater than §b0§r, then this value corresponds to the §6starting time of the loop§r, in ticks
clienttime.config.time.info.loopspeed: How quickly the §6time should advance§r, in ticks per second, when looping. Set this value to §b0§r to §cdisable§r looping altogether
clienttime.config.time.info.loopstart: The §6start time§r of the loop, in ticks
clienttime.config.time.info.loopend: The §6end time§r of the loop, in ticks
